ghostPost.title: Microsoft Ignite 2021 Summary
ghostPost.excerpt: Fresh news from MSIgnite 2021 focused on Microsoft Viva, Azure DevOps for managing data on an industrial IoT device, and the most exciting version of Dynamics 365 yet for business development teams.

ghostPost.plaintext:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Viva, Teams, Edge AI, and Dynamics 365 gets a fresh look.
TLDR: Viva is an employee experience platform to connect colleagues to each
other and their work product. AI model deployment to IoT devices can be
simulated within the Azure environment, and that was extremely interesting to
observe. Lastly, Dynamics 365, Microsoft's underdog CRM competing against
Salesforce, has benefitted tremendously from unified UI across product teams.

Here is the MS Ignite 2021 Virtual Conference
[https://myignite.microsoft.com/home].

All of the various examples of Viva across Microsoft products like Teams,
SharePoint landing page and Outlook.In-depth content training on Power BI
showing SQL Server, Excel, Cosmos DB and Server Cubes as Power Query sources
into Power BI.
ghostPost.html:
Viva, Teams, Edge AI, and Dynamics 365 gets a fresh look.

TLDR: Viva is an employee experience platform to connect colleagues to each other and their work product. AI model deployment to IoT devices can be simulated within the Azure environment, and that was extremely interesting to observe. Lastly, Dynamics 365, Microsoft's underdog CRM competing against Salesforce, has benefitted tremendously from unified UI across product teams.

Here is the MS Ignite 2021 Virtual Conference.
